name: wombat-dressing-room
description: npm registry proxy designed to reduce the attack surface of npm publish

scripts.develop: cp config/local.env ./.env && npm run compile && npm start
scripts.compile: npm run compile-frontend && npm run compile-server
scripts.compile-frontend: mkdir -p public && cd ./packages/app && npm run build && cp -R build/* ../../public
scripts.test: npm run test-server && npm run test-app
scripts.internal-deploy: cp config/internal.env .env && gcloud app deploy app-internal.yaml --project $GCLOUD_PROJECT --no-promote --no-stop-previous-version
scripts.external-deploy: cp config/external.env .env && gcloud app deploy app-external.yaml --project $GCLOUD_PROJECT --no-promote --no-stop-previous-version
scripts.deploy: npm run compile && npm run internal-deploy && npm run external-deploy
scripts.postinstall: npm run install-app && npm run install-server

author: Google LLC
